location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 57 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a statement of the expenses incurred by Syed Humza of Johanna [Nzwane] at Bushire, from his arrival at that port on 25 April 1824 to his departure for Muscat on 28 August 1824. It also notes that a firman has been sent from Shiraz to Shaikh Kalfaur of Assiloo [Bandar-e ‘Asalūyeh], instructing him to pay compensation to Syed Humza for the dates detained at Assiloo by Moola Ghais.
